text: Tamen ba zhenzhu suo chuangzao de nong chan he shengchu, yi fen gong xian zhenzhu,(yi fen gong xian ouxiang), tamen wangyan:`Zhe shi zhenzhu de, zhe shi women de pei zhu de.'Gong xian tamen de pei zhu de, buneng bo guizhenzhu; gong xian zhenzhu de, que keyi bo gui tamen de pei zhu. Tamen de jueding zhen elie!
